unnormalised: Ayurveda treatments are so interesting! My Dadi swears by them. Remember that time in Kerala back in 2010 when we tried Abhyanga at an Arya Vaidya Sala branch? Feeling balanced after that, for sure. Heard good things about treatments at Kottakkal. Anyone tried Panchakarma? I'm thinking of booking something around Diwali, maybe around 23/10/2024 or even early November, say 05/11/2024, and have a 7-day detox. Would love recommendations! Also, need to be there by 10:00 hrs. Thanks!
